close

public void close(boolean force)
Description copied from class: Host.ExecHandle
KILLs process

Specified by:
close in class Host.ExecHandle
Parameters:
force - - on Windows, if the process crashed and Windows Error Reporting(WER) is enabled (default=enabled), then a WER Popup dialog will block the process from being killed. set force=true if the process needs to be killed even in this situation (normally process should be left running/crashed so user can debug it)
